title: SHANG CHI: Every Easter Egg and Full BREAKDOWN + Every MCU Connection | What's Next For Marvel
author: ScreenCrush
comment: Who do you think the rings summoned?
Asian Mom be like: why can’t you be like Shang Chi and have 20 rings

“They stab it with their steely knives, 
But they just can't kill the beast”

Is a jab at Steely Dan who the Eagles had a friendly rivalry with at the time.
I like how they turned one of Mcu’s most hated twist with Trevor and Killian into just a ruse for the real Mandarin 🤣
The biggest plot was actually your way of connecting Trevor's hairline to the Keeps sponsor
description:
Thanks to Keeps for sponsoring this video! Go to https://www.keeps.com/screencrush to get 50% off your first order of Keeps hair loss treatment.

ShangChi and the Legend of the Ten Rings opens up a new chapter in the Marvel Cinematic Universe. With plenty of connections to the phases of the Infinity Saga that came before it. In this video we break don the Mandarin's origins, the ten rings real purpose, Wong, the Abomination, and where all of this is going to lead. Also, what's up with Banner being human instead of Professor Hulk? Why does Carol always peace out of her phone calls? We've got the answers.
